thread.title: Win An Aerial Photography Shoot for Your Nonprofit
thread.title_full: Win An Aerial Photography Shoot for Your Nonprofit - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Win An Aerial Photography Shoot for Your Nonprofit
text:
Philly by Air will be giving away a free aerial photography shoot to one lucky nonprofit organization.
Philadelphia, PA (PRWEB) October 14, 2015
Philly by Air is excited to announce that it will be awarding a free aerial photography shoot to one nonprofit in the greater Philadelphia area.
Valued at $1,000, the shoot will include up to 15 high resolution still images, shot from a professional-grade drone quadcopter. The pictures can be used to showcase the nonprofit's mission in action, a big event, or anything else they'd like to feature.
The winner will receive full licensing rights to use the images with promotional materials, their website, or social channels.
In order to enter, simply follow the instructions here .
Don't wait, the deadline to enter is November 15th.
A winner will be selected by November 25th based on their email submission and the social engagement (retweets, likes, shares) of their posts.
View the official rules and learn more by visiting: http://www.phillybyair.com/blog/nonprofit-aerial-shoot-giveaway
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13016181.htm
Information contained on this page is provided by an independent third-party content provider. WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith. If you have any questions or comments about this page please contact pressreleases@worldnow.com .
